title: Learning Analytics-Based Strategies for Improving MOOC Engagement Retention

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and understanding of fundamental social science concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in constrained technological environments based on smartphones, with the core challenge being sustained engagement of non-degree-seeking adult learners

learning_goals: Learners diagnose individual learning patterns with 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools provided on MOOC platforms
Establish personalized learning plans based on analysis results and achieve sustained learning engagement for four weeks or more
Participate in peer interaction activities (discussions, feedback) at least twice weekly and improve social learning engagement by 30%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
